workshoptitle: Evolve Oracle database applications online with Edition Based Redefinition,Online Redefinition

tutorials.title: Introduction to workshop
tutorials.description: Learn how to use Edition-Based Redefinition (EBR) and Online Table Reorganization (DBMS_REDEFINITION) along with SQLcl and its Liquibase integration. These unique Oracle technologies will let you evolve your database schemas online, without any interruption, using a rolling, blue-green deployment style.
